properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 8:48PM EST until February 7 at 8:12PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Alcovy River near Lawrenceville affecting Gwinnett and Walton
Counties

Yellow River near East Lithonia affecting De Kalb and Rockdale
Counties

Yellow River near Conyers below Milstead affecting Newton and
Rockdale Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Little Haynes Creek near Milstead affecting Newton and Rockdale
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Yellow River near East Lithonia.
* Until Friday evening.
* At 8 PM Thursday the stage was 14.4 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 15.7 feet by early Friday
morning and then begin to fall. The river will fall below flood
stage early Friday afternoon.
* At 15 feet, minor flooding continues and expands further into
the woodlands and fields near the river upstream and downstream
from the gage on Pleasant Hill Road. In Dekalb County...some
flooding of backyards of homes begin on Harmony Hills Drive and
Court. Johnson Creek flowing under Union Grove Road into the river
begins to back up.
